The guide of travelers:
The objectives of the punitive expedition are as follows: * Basilisk * * Tarlk *, Senior Tarlk Basilisk *, Hunter Gargoyle * * Gnol Rebel *, * Sphinx *, * Warrior Sphinx and * Shaman * * Sphinx *. These creatures slum in the Forest of Thieves. These monsters must be destroyed in whatever costs. You did manage, is not it?
